basics.name: Shaine O'Neal
basics.label: Research Data Specialist
basics.summary: Detail-oriented Research Data Specialist with nearly 2 years of experience in optimizing data collection and managing data operations. Proficient in Python, R, MySQL, and Tableau, I have streamlined processes by collaborating with engineers and developers, enhancing data integrity and efficiency. Notably, I developed a Chrome extension that improved user experience for a popular platform, showcasing my ability to merge technical skills with user-centric design.

work.name: GE Vernova (contracted through TEC Industrial)
highlights: Improved data system availability by ensuring the integrity and efficiency of back-end systems while managing end-to-end data operations for a testing facility.
Worked with test engineers and lab technicians to optimize data collection and minimize errors/gaps in test data.
Coordinated with software developers to optimize data collection processes and address bottlenecks.

work.name: Clemson University
highlights: Conducted preventative maintenance and inspections on AV equipment to ensure optimal performance and reliability.
Provided technical support and troubleshooting for AV equipment in classrooms, conference rooms, and event spaces across campus.

work.name: Spartanburg Regional Hospital
highlights: Provided emergency medical care and transportation for patients in pre-hospital settings.
Assisted in patient assessments, vital sign monitoring, and basic life support interventions.
Collaborated with healthcare teams to ensure continuity of care and effective communication.

projects.name: AO3 Archiver
highlights: Developed a Chrome extension to enhance the Archive of Our Own (AO3) experience by saving works to Google Sheets.
Implemented OAuth2 authentication for secure Google account login.
Integrated with Google Sheets API for data storage.
Configured Webpack for build automation and GitHub Actions for CI/CD.
Technologies: TypeScript, React, Zustand, Webpack, Google Sheets API, Chrome Extensions API, Jest, ESLint, Prettier, GitHub Actions

projects.name: Using Recovery Coaching to Overcome Recovery Barriers in Substance Use Disorder
highlights: Worked as primary data analyst in research exploring the use of recovery coaching to overcome barriers for patients with substance use disorders.
